__e: She's a lovely lady, but she's gone.
This is the charming lady who saved my life at the concert.
You're right, of course, but I never expected that a lady as lovely as you would have read my book so carefully.
See this lovely young lady sitting right here in the front row
My dear Laura... you're a lovely young lady... and Harry's extremely lucky to have you.
I didn't realize it before, but she is a very sweet young lady.
What a lovely idea, Charles. It would be a novelty.
I thought it was lovely. I thought you'd like it.
Aw Jim, is this from you?
Should I let my family distract me?
What a wonderful, loving family you have.
What a pleasure to have you and your lovely wife to sup, Your Grace.
Actually, I came here to see my lovely wife and to ask her, a) Who she slept with;
Just like the hearts of the two children I never had because my lovely wife hates kids.
